column4: Question:   Why would opening a game. 1. Open Ubuntu Software center    2. Place me on the default screen without prompting me to download anything?
did you use the search menu, it may have been a uninstalled game thus asking you to install it
I just installed it lastnight. Didn't do anything but, "apt-get update". Came back today and now it wont open.   After reinstalling the bin file it now sends me to ubuntu software center
Any idea after what I posted up there? ^^
